SA20bsa022_u:4: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptiryadi nārthataḥ // Vvṛ_2 //
SA20bsa022_u:9: tiraścāṃ sambhavaḥ svarge yathā ca narake tathā /
SA20bsa022_u:10: na pretānāṃ yatastajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te // Vvṛ_5 //
SA20bsa022_u:12: iṣyate pariṇāmaśca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate // Vvṛ_6 //
SA20bsa022_u:14: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ // Vvṛ_7 //
SA20bsa022_u:17: nāstīha satva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ
SA20bsa022_u:22: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
SA20bsa022_u:23: na ca te saṃhatā yasmātparamāṇurna sidhyati // Vvṛ_11 //
SA20bsa022_u:27: na cānavayavatvena tatsaṃyogād na sidhyati // Vvṛ_13 //
SA20bsa022_u:29: chāyāvṛtī kathaṃ vā anyo na piṇḍaścenna tasya te // Vvṛ_14 //
SA20bsa022_u:31: vicchinnānekavṛttiśca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet // Vvṛ_15 //
SA20bsa022_u:32: pratyakṣabuddhiḥ svapnādau yathā sa ca yadā tadā /
SA20bsa022_u:33: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ // Vvṛ_16 //
SA20bsa022_u:34: uktaṃ yathā tadābhāsā vijñaptiḥ smaraṇaṃ tataḥ /
SA20bsa022_u:37: middhenopahataṃ cittaṃ svapne tenāsamaṃ phalaṃ // Vvṛ_18 //
SA20bsa022_u:41: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati // Vvṛ_20 //
SA20bsa022_u:45: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā buddhagocaraḥ // Vvṛ_22 //
